    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset represents the location of Public Art places in Arlington County, VA 2006</abstract>
      <purpose>This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a base map to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. </purpose>
    </descript>
